Generation V.Black: Blades comprise this Pokémon's entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
Generation V.White: They fight at Bisharp's command. They cling to their prey and inflict damage by sinking their blades into it.
Generation V.Black 2: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.
Generation V.White 2: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.

Generation VI.X: Blades comprise this Pokémon's entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
Generation VI.Y: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Blades comprise this Pokémon's entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: After shredding its prey, it sharpens its blades on a stone by the river. Each Pawniard has its own favorite sharpening stone.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It follows Bisharp's orders to a tee when it attacks enemies. After slashing an opponent, Pawniard clangs both of its blades together.

Generation VIII.Sword: It uses river stones to maintain the cutting edges of the blades covering its body. These sharpened blades allow it to bring down opponents.
Generation VIII.Shield: A pack of these Pokémon forms to serve a Bisharp boss. Each Pawniard trains diligently, dreaming of one day taking the lead.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Pawniard will fearlessly challenge even powerful foes. In a pinch, it will cling to opponents and pierce them with the blades all over its body.
Generation IX.Violet: Any chips in its blades would prove fatal for it. After each battle, it diligently maintains its blades using its favorite sharpening stone.

Generation VI.X: Route 15 , Lost Hotel , Friend Safari ( Dark )
Generation VI.Y: Route 15 , Lost Hotel , Friend Safari ( Dark )

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 8 , Motostoke Outskirts , Giant's Cap , Giant's Mirror , Stony Wilderness , Motostoke Riverbank West Lake Axewell , Giant's Seat , Stony Wilderness , Giant's Mirror , Dusty Bowl , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 8 , Motostoke Outskirts , Giant's Cap , Giant's Mirror , Stony Wilderness , Motostoke Riverbank West Lake Axewell , Giant's Seat , Stony Wilderness , Giant's Mirror , Dusty Bowl , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Soothing Wetlands , Forest of Focus , Challenge Road , Potbottom Desert

Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area Five East Province: Area Three North Province: Area Two Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
